data.text:
Summer training camp. To support us through 
the tough training, food stalls were setup so 
we could grab a bite to eat during breaks.
data.processed:
<story>Summer training camp. To support us through 
<story>the tough training, food stalls were setup so 
<story>we could grab a bite to eat during breaks.

data.text:
All the veggies at this stall are really good, huh~. 
The flavor is rich, and they've got a nice shape.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>All the veggies at this stall are really good, huh~. 
<story>The flavor is rich, and they've got a nice shape.

data.text:
Gahahaha! I'm glad you're enjoying them! 
Harvesting them was worth it.
data.name: Local
data.processed:
<story>Gahahaha! I'm glad you're enjoying them! 
<story>Harvesting them was worth it.

data.text:
Eh!? Old man, you grew these!? 
Amazing!!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Eh!? Old man, you grew these!? 
<story>Amazing!!

data.text:
Got that right! They turned out pretty well, huh? I like to 
think that I'm pretty good at growing vegetables! Gahahaha!
data.name: Local
data.processed:
<story>Got that right! They turned out pretty well, huh? I like to 
<story>think that I'm pretty good at growing vegetables! Gahahaha!

data.text:
I wonder just what his field looks like. As a beginner 
I was interested, and before I could stop myself――

choices.text: Can we take a look at your field!?

data.processed:
<story>I wonder just what his field looks like. As a beginner 
<story>I was interested, and before I could stop myself――

data.text: Huh?
data.name: Local
data.processed: <story>Huh?

data.text:
There were many well-maintained rows and even 
a hand-made scarecrow. As someone who's become 
interested in this, the scenery is exciting.
data.processed:
<story>There were many well-maintained rows and even 
<story>a hand-made scarecrow. As someone who's become 
<story>interested in this, the scenery is exciting.

data.text:
Oh, for a bird repellant, this is really good! ……Old man! 
Do you think you could make one of these for us too?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Oh, for a bird repellant, this is really good! ……Old man! 
<story>Do you think you could make one of these for us too?

data.text:
Sure thing! ……But you know, I never expected a student from that 
world famous Tracen Academy would be working a field as a hobby……
data.name: Local
data.processed:
<story>Sure thing! ……But you know, I never expected a student from that 
<story>world famous Tracen Academy would be working a field as a hobby……

data.text:
It's way smaller than this one here though! 
But, when it comes to flavor, I'm confident! Right, Trainer-san!?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>It's way smaller than this one here though! 
<story>But, when it comes to flavor, I'm confident! Right, Trainer-san!?

data.text:
Oooh~! ……But, I'm pretty particular about my tomatoes! 
Want to take a look?
data.name: Local
data.processed:
<story>Oooh~! ……But, I'm pretty particular about my tomatoes! 
<story>Want to take a look?

data.text:
After that, we exchanged advice and opinions, 
then promised to help with the harvest tomorrow morning.
data.processed:
<story>After that, we exchanged advice and opinions, 
<story>then promised to help with the harvest tomorrow morning.

data.text: However――
data.processed: <story>However――

data.text:
……The storm's gotten stronger huh? 
How'd the evacuation go?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

choices.text: Seems like it's going fine so far

data.processed:
<story>……The storm's gotten stronger huh? 
<story>How'd the evacuation go?

data.text:
I see. That's good then. 
…………
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>I see. That's good then. 
<story>…………

data.text:
Yeah……but, at this point all you can do is wait. Going out to 
check on your fields at a time like this is out of the question.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Yeah……but, at this point all you can do is wait. Going out to 
<story>check on your fields at a time like this is out of the question.

data.text:
According to the forecast this'll be over by morning, 
and then we can go take a look. We made a promise, after all!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>According to the forecast this'll be over by morning, 
<story>and then we can go take a look. We made a promise, after all!

data.text: Good morning……yesterday was something, wasn't it?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>Good morning……yesterday was something, wasn't it?

data.text:
……Yeah. So you guys still came. 
It's as you can see. There's nothing left.
data.name: Local
data.processed:
<story>……Yeah. So you guys still came. 
<story>It's as you can see. There's nothing left.

data.text:
Nature is pretty fearsome, isn't it!? 
Humans are no match for it! Hahaha……
data.name: Local
data.processed:
<story>Nature is pretty fearsome, isn't it!? 
<story>Humans are no match for it! Hahaha……

data.text: That's true……
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>That's true……

data.text:
But, standing here worrying about it won't fix anything―― 
Alright! Then what should we start cleaning up first!?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>But, standing here worrying about it won't fix anything―― 
<story>Alright! Then what should we start cleaning up first!?

data.text: ……Ha?
data.name: Local
data.processed: <story>……Ha?

data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>……!

data.text:
Right! But, debris in the water might clog up 
the drainage, so we'll have to clean that up first……
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

choices.text: I'll go borrow some things we need!

data.processed:
<story>Right! But, debris in the water might clog up 
<story>the drainage, so we'll have to clean that up first……

data.text:
H-hold on a minute! Are you serious!? 
There's no way we can repair the field if it's like this……
data.name: Local
data.processed:
<story>H-hold on a minute! Are you serious!? 
<story>There's no way we can repair the field if it's like this……

data.text: Then, are you going to give up?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>Then, are you going to give up?

data.text:
Wha-! ……Of course I don't want to give up! 
But, but you see――
data.name: Local
data.processed:
<story>Wha-! ……Of course I don't want to give up! 
<story>But, but you see――

data.text:
Then there's no reason to hesitate! If you've got a goal in mind, 
then there's nothing left but to move forward――
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Then there's no reason to hesitate! If you've got a goal in mind, 
<story>then there's nothing left but to move forward――

data.text:
A small setback like this, we'll blow it away! 
Then next year, you can treat us to something tasty again!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>A small setback like this, we'll blow it away! 
<story>Then next year, you can treat us to something tasty again!

data.text:
B-both of you……sniff――ah, damnit! 
If you say something like that, then I can't help but get fired up!
data.name: Local
data.processed:
<story>B-both of you……sniff――ah, damnit! 
<story>If you say something like that, then I can't help but get fired up!

data.text:
Alright, let's do this! I was looking to fix 
things from the ground up anyways! At this point, 
we might as well smash it all and power up!
data.name: Local
data.processed:
<story>Alright, let's do this! I was looking to fix 
<story>things from the ground up anyways! At this point, 
<story>we might as well smash it all and power up!

data.text:
I'm glad~, looks like were able to make it work! That old man, 
halfway through he had gotten back on his feet and was having fun.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>I'm glad~, looks like were able to make it work! That old man, 
<story>halfway through he had gotten back on his feet and was having fun.

data.text:
Haha! Trainer-san, seems like you've gotten a 
bit more reliable~. Even though in the very 
beginning you fell on your butt because of a bug.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Haha! Trainer-san, seems like you've gotten a 
<story>bit more reliable~. Even though in the very 
<story>beginning you fell on your butt because of a bug.

data.text:
But even so, 『It was fun』, huh? ……If Trainer-san had been 
around at that time, I probably would have been having fun too.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>But even so, 『It was fun』, huh? ……If Trainer-san had been 
<story>around at that time, I probably would have been having fun too.

data.text:
Some time before I met Trainer-san, 
there was a day where the rain was extremely heavy.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Some time before I met Trainer-san, 
<story>there was a day where the rain was extremely heavy.

data.text:
Just like with this time, when I went to check on the field 
in the morning, and everything was just one big mess……
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Just like with this time, when I went to check on the field 
<story>in the morning, and everything was just one big mess……

data.text:
That was the first time I'd seen a field left like that 
on my own. Usually I had my family with me, you see.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>That was the first time I'd seen a field left like that 
<story>on my own. Usually I had my family with me, you see.

data.text:
There was never a day where I wanted to 
just leave and go home more than that day.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>There was never a day where I wanted to 
<story>just leave and go home more than that day.

data.text:
If everyone was there, then we'd all be saying how 
awful it was. But, together we'd end up getting 
all muddy, but we'd be laughing the entire time.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>If everyone was there, then we'd all be saying how 
<story>awful it was. But, together we'd end up getting 
<story>all muddy, but we'd be laughing the entire time.

data.text:
……But! 
I don't think a day like that will ever come again.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>……But! 
<story>I don't think a day like that will ever come again.

data.text: (After all――)
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>(After all――)

data.text:
After all, Y'see―― 
I've got Trainer-san with me!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>After all, Y'see―― 
<story>I've got Trainer-san with me!

data.text:
Katsuragi Ace had that mischievious smile on 
her face again. The look she gave me this time, 
had none of the shadows of doubt from before.

choices.text: Of course! ……Just look at these biceps!
Of course! ……Just look at these biceps!

data.processed:
<story>Katsuragi Ace had that mischievious smile on 
<story>her face again. The look she gave me this time, 
<story>had none of the shadows of doubt from before.

data.text:
Hmmm~……biceps? Where? 
Pretty sure if anyone had them, it would be me――
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Hmmm~……biceps? Where? 
<story>Pretty sure if anyone had them, it would be me――

data.text:
Pfft, you've got a really frustrated look on your face! 
Kukukuu……Ahahahahahaa!!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Pfft, you've got a really frustrated look on your face! 
<story>Kukukuu……Ahahahahahaa!!

data.text:
I couldn't help but laugh along with Katsuragi Ace. 
Maybe that's why I realized, I was suddenly really tired.
data.processed:
<story>I couldn't help but laugh along with Katsuragi Ace. 
<story>Maybe that's why I realized, I was suddenly really tired.

data.text:
……Fuwaaa~~ 
Fufu, Trainer-san, I see you passed that yawn along.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>……Fuwaaa~~ 
<story>Fufu, Trainer-san, I see you passed that yawn along.

data.text:
Guess I'll take it easy for a little bit longer……
it's nice and sunny still too……
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Guess I'll take it easy for a little bit longer……
<story>it's nice and sunny still too……

data.text:
Waah! Ace and Trainer-san are leaning against each other 
and sleeping? Ehh~ it's just like a youthful drama~♪
data.name: Ace's Classmate A
data.processed:
<story>Waah! Ace and Trainer-san are leaning against each other 
<story>and sleeping? Ehh~ it's just like a youthful drama~♪

data.text:
Seriously, they get along so well~. 
I'll snap a pic and show her later.
data.name: Ace's Classmate B
data.processed:
<story>Seriously, they get along so well~. 
<story>I'll snap a pic and show her later.
